attributes.action: stop the monopoly by kingston comms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as a broad band user i pettion the prime minister to stop this monopoly as ive tried to get other broad bands but kingston have the last say as all lines go through them lets kick karoo and kingston in to touch and get cheaper broad band and lines for hull users please mr priminster we are on a monopoly and are restricted to karoo only please stop this now

rejection.details: Please contact the competition commission directly.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
